plot: The story of the stormy relationship between King Friedrich Wilhelm and his son, who later became known as King Frederick the Great of Prussia.
title: Der alte und der junge König - Friedrichs des Grossen Jugend
plot_es: The story of the stormy relationship between King Friedrich Wilhelm and his son, who later became known as King Frederick the Great of Prussia.
original_name: Der alte und der junge König - Friedrichs des Grossen Jugend
plot_en: The story of the stormy relationship between King Friedrich Wilhelm and his son, who later became known as King Frederick the Great of Prussia.

cast.role: Friedrich Wilhelm I. König von Preussen
cast.name: Emil Jannings
